title: South Australian politician and ‘watchdog’ Frank Pangallo caught using unverified AI generated information to prove conspiracy
description: He has admitted to using artificial intelligence to craft his submissions to parliament.
content:
A politician is under fire after admitting to using artificial intelligence to generate academic sources he then submitted to a parliamentary inquiry.
However, some of the sources did not exist.

title: Taiwan GDP per capita lead over Korea attributed to TSMC, AI boom
description: Yeh Chun-hsien, head of the National Development Council (NDC), on Wednesday attributed Taiwan's forecast lead over South Korea in gross domestic product (GDP) per capita in 2025 to the success of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. (TSMC) and a boom in artificial intelligence applications, as per a report by Focus Taiwan.

title: Elon Musk says Grok 5 training starts in few weeks, it has a shot at achieving AGI
description: Tech billionaire Elon Musk has hinted that his company xAI might reach human-like Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) with Grok 5 model, which is set to start testing soon.
content: Artificial Intelligence is only getting better each day. Models like OpenAI’s ChatGPT and Elon Musk’s Grok can analyse and compute incredible amounts of data. Yet, no Large Language Model (LLM) has reached Artificial General Intelligence (AGI). Now, ... [1931 chars]

title: OpenAI releases first-of-kind study revealing how people use ChatGPT
description: A first-of-its-kind study has revealed how people are using OpenAI’s popular artificial intelligence chatbot ChatGPT.
content:
Despite rapid adoption of large language models like OpenAI's ChatGPT, few comprehensive studies have delved into exactly how the technology is being used in everyday life — that is, until now.

title: China Bans Nvidia Chip Purchases For Major Tech Firms, Stock Falls In Wednesday Pre-Market
description: In a move to bolster its semiconductor independence and compete with the U.S., China has banned its leading technology companies from procuring Nvidia Corporation (NASDAQ: NVDA)'s artificial intelligence (AI) chips.
content:
China has banned its leading technology companies from procuring Nvidia Corporation NVDA’s artificial intelligence (AI) chips. During Wednesday’s pre-market trading session, Nvidia stock fell nearly 1.5%.

title: Artificial Intelligence could lift global trade 34-37% by 2040: WTO
description: WTO report warns of potential trade barriers for AI-enabling goods, stresses need for inclusive policies and international cooperation.
content:
Global trade is projected to rise by 34-37 per cent by 2040 with right enabling policies to leverage Artificial Intelligence (AI) for productivity gains and lower trade costs, per a new WTO report.

title: Crypto Is The Money For AI, Says Economist As Coinbase CEO Teases Stablecoin-Powered Transactions Between Agents
description: Renowned economist Alex Tabbarok described cryptocurrencies as the “money” for artificial intelligence on Tuesday after Coinbase Global Inc. (NASDAQ:COIN) CEO teased a new feature that enables AI agents to transact using stablecoins.
content:

title: AI set to transform global trade, says World Trade Organization report
description: A new WTO report suggests artificial intelligence could significantly boost global trade and GDP by 2040, potentially increasing trade value by nearly 40%. AI-driven technologies can reduce trade costs and enhance productivity, especially benefiting small producers. However, the report cautions that without targeted investment and inclusive policies, AI could exacerbate existing economic divides, leaving some workers and economies behind.
content:

title: AI set to transform global trade, says World Trade Organization report
description: Artificial intelligence could boost the value of trade in goods and services by nearly 40% by 2040, but without adequate policies it could also exacerbate economic divides, a new World Trade Organization report warned on Wednesday.

title: Moonpig shares soar as subscribers top 1m and AI stickers prove a hit
description: Strong demand for product personalisation and artificial intelligence tech helped buoy the firm's bottom line in recent months, Moonpig said.
content:
Moonpig shares rose sharply on Wednesday after the group posted an upbeat trading update ahead of its annual general meeting.
